segments.text: Are you also going to Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , on a business trip . How about Yuu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm taking a vacation to visit a friend there . Have you ever been there before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I Went there once last summer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it is amazing . You can enjoy both the traditional Chinese culture as well as the vitality of a modern cosmopolitan city . The only thing I didn't enjoy was the subway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.These were always so many people.After taking the subway during the rush hour , you'll envy sardines in their cans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , maybe I can take the bus or even rent a car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . Wish you a great vacation !
segments.speaker: S1
